short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform text descriptions into colors directly in Canva's color picker. Enhance your workflow with AI-powered color selection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text2Color for Canva brings the power of natural language color selection to your Canva designs. With Text2Color, you can simply describe the color you're envisioning, and watch as it magically appears in your Canva color picker.

1. Seamless Integration - works directly within Canva's interface
2. Natural Language Input - describe colors in your own words
3. AI-Powered - utilizes advanced AI to interpret color descriptions
4. Time-Saving - quickly find the perfect color without manual adjustments
5. User-Friendly - simple, intuitive interface that matches Canva's design

How It Works:

- Open any color picker in Canva
- Find the new "Describe a color..." input field
- Type in your color description (e.g., "sunset orange", "deep sea blue")
- Press Enter or click the sparkle icon
- Watch as your described color appears in the Canva color picker

Perfect for designers, marketers, and anyone who wants to streamline their color selection process in Canva. Say goodbye to endless scrolling through color palettes, googling brand colors and say hello to intuitive, description-based color picking!

To make the extension work, add your API key from Text2Color.com - you can create an account and generate colors for free, with a limited number of credits. Click on the Text2Color extension icon in your Chrome toolbar. In the popup, enter your API key from Text2Color.com and click "Save".

Not affiliated with Canva.com
